entry.title: FLX981S (beaded circle brooch)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Fashion
Price: 4.00

These brooches has been wet felted from 100% wool and is one of the best eco-friendly made out of using only soap and warm water. They are a super accessory and can adorn jacket, hat, dress, or handbag. Azo free dyes. The pin back is securely stitched not glues.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material.
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover.
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.
size: 3" cir


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
